author: tersec
content: Looking at adding Electra builder API support and https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/101/files seems to be the most recent version, but https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.5.0-alpha.5/specs/electra/beacon-chain.md#beaconblockbody hasn't (directly) had a `consolidations` field in a while. To confirm, the blinded version probably should not either, and follow the usual pattern of replacing various `foo` with `foo_root`?

author: tersec
content: i.e. the only difference is the indirect `ExecutionPayloadHeader`

author: tersec
content: otherwise the usual `hash_tree_root(Foo) == hash_tree_root(FooHeader)` can't hold
